text: and so today we're announcing two new
EBS volumes specifically built for big
data workloads and throughput the first
is a throughput optimized HDD volume
called ST1 this provides up to 500 Meg
per second at a remarkably low cost this
is a step level change for customers in
the cost and performance of hard drives
which are still the optimal choice for
Block storage for Big Data so up to 500
Meg per second at 42 cents per Gab per
month and for data which you're
accessing less frequently we have a cold
HDD volume SC1 which provides 250 Meg
per second at just 2 and a half cents
per gigabyte per month that's cheaper
than S3 so this is excellent for big
data workloads in fact this is the
industry's best priced performance for
Block storage for these high throughput
workloads and commonly seen in log
processing uh streaming data processing
specifically Apache Kafka data analytics
with map reduce and in fact map elastic
map reduce will support these new block
volumes straight out of the gate data
warehousing and less frequently accessed
data that'll sit in colder volumes
